    • Method Detail

      • getPeers

        public Collection<Peer> getPeers()
        Description copied from interface: PeerSource
        Get the list of peers. Implementations should return empty list before PeerSource.update() has been called for the first time.
        Specified by:
        getPeers in interface PeerSource
        Returns:
        List of peers

      • update

        public boolean update()
        Description copied from interface: PeerSource
        Ask to update the list of peers (usually from an external source). Implementations may choose to refuse to perform an update under certain conditions, e.g. when insufficient time has passed since the last update.
        Specified by:
        update in interface PeerSource
        Returns:
        true if the list of peers has been updated; false otherwise
